game_description: Do flawless marksmanship to be victorious in bottle shooter game. Different riffles like grenade launcher, Assault Rifle, Sniper Rifle, Bravo Squad Assault rifle, etc. Have fun and excitement with VR gaming mode. Experience the most unique and Action-packed game in VR. Tremendous game play with different Guns. Experience the shoot bottles in Realistic way. Beautiful 3D graphic Visualization and Addictive gaming Mode. Complete levels and win amazing Gaming points. Easy Controls for Aim and smash the bottles. Enjoy the real sound of glass breaking and guns. Key Features: ~Different ranges guns ~VR Smart gaming view ~Addictive gameplay ~3D visualization graphics ~Many Unique and Complicated levels ~Real sound of Glass Breaking ~Real Target Bottle Shooting ~Easy and smooth controls for shoot the bottle Play like professional sport player and complete all tough levels in Energetic way. Shoot and broke the bottles and Show off your Marvelous Marksmanship in real.
review_2: Clips don’t clip. Mags don’t spawn. No info how to get more ammo. No practise level available til you’ve completed 3 stages??? Clunky. Help vid/animation is not helpful. Boring. I’d give it no stars but have to do as to submit review!
review_3: This is the most buggiest game I've ever played and the trailer is a animation for half this should be free of how bad it is
review_4: One of the clunkiest games I've ever played on the quest
